title: Weather Web App
description: Built an interactive weather app that supports real-time weather data for both desktop and mobile with responsive design.

title: Sorting visualizer
description: Implemented Bubble Sort, Selection Sort, Insertion Sort, and Merge Sort algorithms in Sorting Visualizer, optimizing code for efficient desktop performance.

title: Movie Website
description: Built an interactive movie web app that suggests movies to users according to their choice based on reviews and short summaries.
